title: Basic Usage
content: For details, see the following example.
findIntroStr: Country: country/region component, which is used to display and select country/region names. The options are obtained by configuring the data source.

title: Custom Service
content: You can use the fetch-country attribute to specify a method in which the service customized by the request can be implemented. clearable: indicates whether data can be cleared. The default value is true.
findIntroStr: Country: country/region component, which is used to display and select country/region names. The options are obtained by configuring the data source.

title: Custom Data Fields
content: When a user-defined data body is used, fields must be used to specify fields.
findIntroStr: Country: country/region component, which is used to display and select country/region names. The options are obtained by configuring the data source.
